website_summaries.verdict: While the Canon EOS Rebel T5i is -- almost literally -- the same solid camera as its predecessor, it's starting to lag frustratingly behind the competition in some ways.
pros: The Canon EOS Rebel T5i retains the great articulated touch-screen implementation that's optimized for video, and delivers the same excellent photo quality and solid video as its predecessor
Plus the performance is slightly improved
cons: The phase-detection autofocus system is feeling its age and competitors have caught up with the Live View performance
The tiny autofocus points in the viewfinder also remain annoying to use, and the feature set remains lackluster

website_summaries.verdict: The Canon EOS Rebel T5i is essentially the same camera as its predecessor, and it's still a solid performer.
pros: Nearly silent video autofocus when used with STM lenses
Good image detail at high ISOs
cons: Very limited burst shooting in Raw mode
Video autofocus is choppy with non-STM lenses

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: For the past 4 years I shot a Canon Rebel XS and enjoyed it. I got my T5i today and was blown away by the vivid colors, the touch screen is a great thing. I bought the body only and shoot with a 18-135mm lens. This is a great combination and am very pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: R. Newberry

customer_reviews.title: great prosumer body
customer_reviews.text: great prosumer body. it's 2017 when i'm writing this review and i'm still using the camera. newer bodies probably work better in lower light but your glass should be where you try to get that speed. i think these are on clearance now, great entry point. the lenses use the new quiet motors too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a terrific camera, with ease of operation and a huge ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a terrific camera, with ease of operation and a huge amount of options to enhance photographs. This model replaced a simpler Canon EOS Rebel that was malfunctioning and not focusing. I like the reversible screen that one can fold out or turn over for easy viewing. While the book to operate it was quite comprehensive, it is clearly written and easy to go through the various options and see how to select them. I recommend reading the book with camera in hand and going through the various choices and learning how to properly select them. Canon EOS Rebel T5i Digital SLR. The camera works well with all of my existing lenses and takes crisp balanced photos.
customer_reviews.author: Paul M. Harman

customer_reviews.title: I have three Canon lenses (AF-S) and tried them with perfect results. Love all the customization options and built ...
customer_reviews.text: I moved up (or would it be forward?) from a Rebel XTi because I wanted the near pro video capture options and ability. I'm not looking back, this thing is the balls. I have three Canon lenses (AF-S) and tried them with perfect results. Love all the customization options and built in 'filters'. I've shot about a hundred photos and 10 movies so far. Extremely pleased with both RAW captures and JPEG images. Now I've got to get to work using all my new Canon software. Feels great in the hand, the new textured case is wonderful, and seems to be as rugged as all Canons.
customer_reviews.author: RolyF

customer_reviews.title: Better than its predecessor!
customer_reviews.text: I have a T3i which I was very pleased with. I wanted another one but because they are discontinued the prices went up and couldn't get it. However, the T5i worked out to be even better for me. The pluses for me is that in video mode it doesn't stop recording around the 10min mark. The T5i will continue to record, it will just however break the video up into 4gig parts. This one is also touch screen and the feel of the camera is a little different but pretty much has the same body as it predecessor.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Light weight, feature jammed
customer_reviews.text: This purchase was specifically for Real Estate photography and Pole Photography. Needed a feature packed light weight camera that would be compatible with current 10-24mm lens and other electronic equipment adaptable requirements. The touch screen and its features including the touch shutter enable and disable feature is invaluable. The SCN feature is a time saver in small low light areas where flash would wash. Video quality is good. All in all, a good consumer camera.
customer_reviews.author: Dale Mr D Simmons

customer_reviews.title: Ridiculously Awesome Camera!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera for my husband for Christmas. He already had a Canon Rebel EOS Xsi SLR camera so I wasn't sure how much better this camera would be but I was shocked. The pictures he's already taken are amazing and we aren't professionals. We have a Jack Russell and we are always trying to capture him on camera but most of the shots end up out of focus. The T5i captures him without any effort and we already have some amazing pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Why did I wait?
customer_reviews.text: So incredibly pleased with this purchase!our last Canon was nearly ten years old. It was still running beautifully but this mom wanted an upgrade. The speed shutter is incredible for catching the action of our three kids. Terrific price! Fast shipping . Best of all.... It is compatable to my other canon lenses and with the video capabilities in this version... I no longer need to carry my video camera!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Leah Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Great improvements of my Canon T3
customer_reviews.text: Great improvements of my Canon T3. ISO button allows for quick changing of sensitivity without entering menus. A video setting on the power switch allows for quicker switching to video, and back to photo without losing your settings on the wheel. SD card side mount allows use of battery pack without blocking sd card. All the annoyances I had with the T3 are corrected. 5 frames per second shooting, 12800 ISO, 18MP. Great product. All lenses, of course, compatible.
customer_reviews.author: JeffNJ

customer_reviews.title: Great camera, great price!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect machine! I am mainly using this for my YouTube channel and I am very happy with the quality and performance. Right now, I am having a little trouble with manual sound recording through an external mic but I think the problem is not about the camera but about me (or the extension cord I bought). Somehow, I am just recieving mono sound in the videos, although my mic is stereo. Hopefully it is not about the camera. I will let you know when I find out. Anyways, definitely a great camera for this price. Go for it.
customer_reviews.author: Cagri Mert Bakirci

customer_reviews.title: Upset
customer_reviews.text: One of the best dlsr’s I’ve owned. Been using it. But it randomly stopped working while I was at a gig. Which I lost over $1,000 because of it. That doesn’t even include the camera body. Smh. I need a refund or something. This really messed me up
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: I am a month in using this camera, I upgraded from a Canon Rebel xt, the first digital camera that had enough megapixels, 8, to take photos that were able to be blown up to 8 by 10 without pixelating. The T5i is so much clearer with 18.meg I am able to zoom in on a prints and still see details. Still learning the ins and outs of the various modes this camera gives me but love the challenge of mastering the process.
customer_reviews.author: Keith E. Tucker

customer_reviews.title: Canon great as always
customer_reviews.text: Bought specifically to use in Africa on research safaris, along with the Canon EF 70-300 USM lens. Didn't take too long to learn to use it and am more than happy with the pictures I got. Canon makes a great sturdy product for heavy outdoor in the bush use. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Toni A.

customer_reviews.title: Wisht that they still produced this camera
customer_reviews.text: Like that it was available and refurbished Dislike that one drop of sweat in wrong place was case to replace my old one I love the ease of use for beginners Suggesrt that a class for the more advance features be taken Picture Quality excellent
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly S.

customer_reviews.title: Love it, love it, love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic camera. The autofocus is intuitive, if not sometimes slow in automatic mode to focus. The face following focus it amazing and functioned much better than our other camera did. The touch screen works well and it's easy to navigate the menus. Image quality is top rate. The only thing that bothers me about Canon is why they constantly mess with the control layouts. Every model seems to have a different way to shoot video. It's crazy!
customer_reviews.author: Jacob E. Sammer

customer_reviews.title: Good, but not Great
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. I'm only a beginner is SLR photography, so I can't give a detailed review. And I've only had it a very short time. What I can say is that the battery life seems to be very good. I should hope so, it's the largest camera battery I've seen so far! But the reason I give it 4 stars instead of 5 is that I don't care for the shutter button. It's just not in a good ergonomic location, in my opinion. My advice, try before you buy!
customer_reviews.author: R. Ishii

customer_reviews.title: Excellent carry camera
customer_reviews.text: This quickly became my favorite long hike carry camera. I teamed it with the EFS 18-135. This gives me a camera system light enough to carry yet powerful enough to give excellent results in the wild. I am very happy with this as the camera to have when hiking in the wilderness.
customer_reviews.author: THOMAS A HIDAY

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera for its price
customer_reviews.text: This is a great camera if you are a fan of the Rebel series by canon. I upgraded from the XS to this T5I and Love everything I've shot with this camera, while the lay out of the camera is a little different from the XS,it didn't take me long to adjust to the few changes... only thing I would like to be improved on is the fact that there is a recording time cap of 30 minutes, when this becomes null and void this series camera will be unstoppable
customer_reviews.author: Danno

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera because our one of our cameras gave out a couple of days prior to a wedding gig. so I needed a second camera. I was so impressed by the picture quality and the video capabilities, that this is now one of our main cameras when it comes to recording video.
customer_reviews.author: Juan

customer_reviews.title: Simply Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera!!! Takes great shots and easy to operate. I was stuck on my Canon AE-1 because i thought this would be a lot more complicated, this is the beat purchase i have made in a long time. The extended battery pack is a must. I have taken over 1000 since purchasing and i haven't even put a dent on the battery. And that's with playing around with the filters and settings on the camera itself! Just a bit heavy with it but really not bad.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase
customer_reviews.text: Ive had this for a few years now and it is the best purchase I have ever made on Amazon. I use it for my blog, my youtube channel and taking photos of my babies. I love it
customer_reviews.author: Kayla R.

customer_reviews.title: Weather hasn't allowed for many field trips but the ones I did get a chance to go on I loved it.
customer_reviews.text: Had it for a couple of weeks. It replaced my T3i. Weather hasn't allowed for many field trips but the ones I did get a chance to go on I loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Mac

customer_reviews.title: Another great rebel.
customer_reviews.text: Another great product by Canon. The most recent model to the rebel line does not disappoint. We are not professional photographers but do enjoy taking photographs. It takes amazing photos and w e use it with our 50mm 1.4 lens in sport mode or no flash mode and takes amazing shots.
customer_reviews.author: Garrett Graham

customer_reviews.title: Great camera.  I would change the design of one thing though.
customer_reviews.text: When you toggle the power on if you push it too far it turns on video, argh! Otherwise it's a great camera for the price. I chose it over the 7D as I felt like I was getting something almost as good for a lot cheaper. It has some gimmicky bells and whistles I don't use, but that's fine. I just don't use them (flip screen, touch screen, ect)
customer_reviews.author: Mary6584

customer_reviews.title: Upgrade from old rebel
customer_reviews.text: i love my new camera. I upgraded from an older version and this new one was an easy transition. Instead of completely revising the camera, it has been enhanced and modernized. It functions basically the same as my older version, but with added benefits such as the Hd movie function. I love Canon cameras and they have never let me down when taking photographs.
customer_reviews.author: Anne H. Palyok

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: Am just beginning into the world of SLR cameras but am quite happy with the purchase. The lenses I have used on it - also from Canon - produce outstanding photographs. Recommend the corresponding "for Dummies" book - it has been very helpful in learning about my camera in an informative and easy to understand way.
customer_reviews.author: JanP

customer_reviews.title: Very good camera
customer_reviews.text: I am a newbie in taking pictures, I've come from point-and-shoot. I've used it as point-and-shoot and love the intelligence built into this thing. I recommend using it for any events and vacations as long as you have a couple lenses for various settings. It is quick capturing with high speed memory sticks.
customer_reviews.author: Seth

customer_reviews.title: I love my canons
customer_reviews.text: I am a Canon girl. Haven't worked with any other brand. I really like this camera. Being able to move the screen is great. Not really a fan of the touchscreen, but you aren't limited to just the touchscreen. I like the special features, like fisheye, black and white, etc. I have also caught myself getting carried away, and flipping to video instead of on. A simple click will do that. Not a huge deal though.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera...without kit lens
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good camera, but personally I wouldn't buy it with the kit lens. I purchased the body only and got a 50mm lens. Very happy with my purchase of both the camera and the lens. The kit lens isn't terrible but if you want to get a lot more out of your camera, buy a prime lens. The swivel, touch-screen screen is very useful. Takes wonderful video and photos. No complaints at all. I'd just suggest the purchase of a few extra batteries to carry along. Check out my youtube channel for some test videos of the camera, all my videos are shot at least partially with the Canon T5i.
customer_reviews.author: FishersofMenFilms

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: I am using for astrophotography. Camera is lite and clear.
customer_reviews.author: Jared Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Very functional!
customer_reviews.text: love love love. Great for any beginner and also for many who know how to play with manual mode. The camera's LCD monitor is great. It's touch screen and it clips out so you can take your silly "selfies", low angle and high angle without having to bend down or stand on a stool. It's awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Lizzy

customer_reviews.title: Love this camera although it's not much different from the other Ti series
customer_reviews.text: I bought this T5i for higher FPS while shooting hummingbirds.However, it's about the same as my T2i so that was a bit disappointing, but I do love the camera & am glad I bought it so I could give my T2i to a friend who is in need of a better camera than her cheapy point & shoot.
customer_reviews.author: hummingbird

customer_reviews.title: Great and amazing camera for film starters
customer_reviews.text: Great and amazing camera for film starters! I will get ML for it and I'm glad that I bought such a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Tony R.

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera that does everything.
customer_reviews.text: The EOS Rebel takes such great pictures that I find it hard to use photo-editing software to improve upon them. Also, it takes great videos with out-of-the-box settings particularly the sound settings.
customer_reviews.author: Phil Hubek

customer_reviews.title: and it's been a great, and cheap
customer_reviews.text: I've made several short films with this little guy, and it's been a great, and cheap, way for me to learn how to use a camera and dip my little pinky toe into the world of amateur filmmaking. I highly recommend it to anyone with aspirations of making films.
customer_reviews.author: Chad Brunette

customer_reviews.title: It is a good camera for the Price
customer_reviews.text: It is a good camera for the Price, I upgraded my t3i to t5i, and tou can see the difference.
customer_reviews.author: Surgeonhawkeye

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: This camera has been great to learn on. The many features on it make for an easy use. Sleek design creates a great feel in the users hand. Huge thumbs up for the amazon customer rep who was instrumental in the purchasing of this item. Great service and great product.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Choi

customer_reviews.title: Loving It
customer_reviews.text: I’m an amateur camera buff at best, but I’m learning to love this unit. This was the best “body only” buy that I’ve found on the net and that is after a considerable amount of research. Very quick ship on this unit.
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: A good camera that is easy to use and makes great ...
customer_reviews.text: Not much difference in the t2i. A good camera that is easy to use and makes great pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Judy E.

customer_reviews.title: I love this camera.
customer_reviews.text: Best. Camera. Ever. Easy to use. Gorgeous pictures. Perfect for me.
customer_reviews.author: thimble

customer_reviews.title: This T5i is a great camera and I am extremely pleased with it
customer_reviews.text: I got the very first EOS Rebel. It finally gave out at Christmas. This T5i is a great camera and I am extremely pleased with it! It is so cool that the lens work so I didn't have to buy a new lens.

customer_reviews.title: everything you expect from canon
customer_reviews.text: camera is brand New, it's not duofocus so it struggles a bit in that area. all round great camera.

customer_reviews.title: It's Practically New
customer_reviews.text: Bought mine used, but it honestly works like it's brand spanking new. I've had it for a few months now, no issues so far! I love it
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Robertson

customer_reviews.title: Cannot beat a Canon.
customer_reviews.text: You can not beat a Canon camera. All members of my immediate family (including two professional photographers) have Canon cameras and Canon Lenses.
customer_reviews.author: Danny D

customer_reviews.title: Great for dental pics
customer_reviews.text: use this camera everyday with a macro lens and ring flash for dental photos and it takes beautiful pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Terry S.

customer_reviews.title: A great camera easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I owned an earlier Canon rebel, the XT that I used for eight years along with a Canon G-10. I love the ability to view the image on a movable screen before taking the picture. There are many modes to use in taking a picture and slowly I am learning all of them. I love macro photography and this camera makes it very easy. There is also a feature that allows you to just touch the screen where you want the camera to focus and the touch it again to actually take the picture. It's a great camera and I am enjoying using it.
customer_reviews.author: glass worker (hobby) guy

customer_reviews.title: Best Canon Rebel Digital SLR Camera Yet!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best Canon Rebel yet!! I ordered it in July, and since receiving it, I have consistently been pleased with the quality of photos and ease of use for this camera!
customer_reviews.author: Marchwind1949

customer_reviews.title: I really like the canon T5i
customer_reviews.text: I am a beginner photographer. This entry level DSLR satisfies all my needs. I just bought the body and got a prime lens for the body. awesome camera. Got loads of features. still lot more to explore. I would definitely recommend this to others. four of my friends bought the same model and we are really happy with the image quality and performance...really fun to use..
customer_reviews.author: Kannan Ramamoorthy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Camera
customer_reviews.text: It is hard to beat a Canon Rebel camera. I bought this one to upgrade from my T2i and now I use them both.

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied and happy snapping everyone.
customer_reviews.text: I had T1i for a while and now this...big difference, from processing to view screen etc. I'm satisfied. What else can I say? I love this csmera!

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Photo Quality, Great Price
customer_reviews.text: Love this camera! I purchased a refurbished one and it works amazingly. I use it to take photos for my online store and I have received so many compliments on the photo quality! I am very happy with this purchase!

customer_reviews.title: Love love love!
customer_reviews.text: I am absolutely in love with this camera. The ability to change settings through touch screen is the best thing ever.

customer_reviews.title: Husband loved getting this
customer_reviews.text: It was everything it said and more. Husband loved getting this.

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: I bought for my wife for our 9th anniversary and it works great. The quality of the photos are excellent. I like that her lenses work perfectly with this.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great camera. canon has come a long way since the early rebel's

customer_reviews.title: just I can say the camera it's perfect for what I need it
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping,just I can say the camera it's perfect for what I need it ,I will business with you guy again thank you

customer_reviews.title: great condition and works like new
customer_reviews.text: Camera came just as specified, great condition and works like new. Thanks!

customer_reviews.title: ~janjo
customer_reviews.text: Love this camera! Still basically same set up as my Rebel T3 but with a few buttons in different places. But what I like the most is the flip out screen which is also a touch screen! :)
customer_reviews.author: Janette

customer_reviews.title: High Quality "Prosumer grade" camera
customer_reviews.text: Canon is simply the best. The pictures, especially with a good lens are sharp, contrasty and even better color than my 40D especially with the 17-55 F2.8 lens! With the new Digic 5 processor, flesh tones are absolutely gorgeous, perfect for portrait photography, and much more. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: good_equipment_bad_photographer

customer_reviews.title: Best camera I have bought yet!
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera...and all the Rebel series but this one is so far the best. very easy to shoot and use. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: CBear82

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginner!
customer_reviews.text: Bought the t5i body for my husband to get started with proper photography. This camera is amazing! So many features for him to work with but still simple enough that I can pick it up for a quick snapshot. We bought a separate 50mm lens and the photos are just amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Bailey

customer_reviews.title: good updated camera
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera as a replacement for an older rebel xs. It is a very good updated camera. I think that it was a good deal for the price.
customer_reviews.author: chrisl

customer_reviews.title: I love all of them but each one is a little ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the third EOS Rebel Digital camera for me. I love all of them but each one is a little better than the previous one. I am an amateur photographer but I take a LOT of pictures!! You can go fully automatic or play around with the other settings...digital photography gives you the freedom to try just about anything!! I have always been a Canon person so I fully recommend any of their cameras.
customer_reviews.author: Donna L

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fine Camera and use regularly with lenses available. Have Rebel T3 for long lense.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn I. Stelzer

customer_reviews.title: I love it to say the least
customer_reviews.text: I love it to say the least! Came in mint condition and so quickly after ordering! Works amazingly! Thank you so so much!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what my daughter wanted. Has all the features she uses and very happy with the quality of the pictures from this camera.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda L. Weber

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with this camera!!! Takes great pictures!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent pictures! We replaced our old Canon rebel (6 years old), and could not be happier with the upgrade. We are recreational photographers, mainly taking pictures of family vacations and the kids. Video ability is great too.
customer_reviews.author: Danica

customer_reviews.title: More controls
customer_reviews.text: Nicer to operate than the Rebel T3I. Like the way all the options are easy to read on the display
customer_reviews.author: Bernie

customer_reviews.title: She has loved it so far
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my wife. She has loved it so far.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this purchase, the Canon EOS Rebel T5i DSLR. It is leaps and bounds an upgrade over my last camera.

customer_reviews.title: Thank you for being professional on your camera knowledge.
customer_reviews.text: Great help from K and M on this camera with a receipt and warranty. Been on the phone all morning and it was well worth it. Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera.
customer_reviews.text: Camera has met all expectations. It was a gift and they really love it. A great little canera. Cheaper than Best Buy.

customer_reviews.title: it's the perfect camera. I can't get into it's details because ...
customer_reviews.text: For an amateur as I am, it's the perfect camera. I can't get into it's details because I don't know much about cameras, but it takes the pictures I want to take pictures of, and the results are great. What more can one ask of a camera such as this????

customer_reviews.title: Yes, Ilove it.
customer_reviews.text: I'd been upgrading from a SX30 to the T5i. I like Canon quality, build and support, really a great camera for a amateur like me. I having fun. lots of it.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I already had a Canon T3i and really really like the results of these cameras. Offer the best performance for a product entry. Can I use all the accessories and lenses T3i. As technological advances, offers touch display, which is easily the most. This is another great product from Canon.

customer_reviews.title: Takes great pictures and gives me more options than I know ...
customer_reviews.text: This camera is an upgrade so am just loving it. Takes great pictures and gives me more options than I know what to do with. I would not purchase any other brand but Canon.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty sturdy, it's been dropped a few times (not ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought the T5i for my wife's birthday and she loves it. Much faster than her old dslr. Pretty sturdy, it's been dropped a few times (not far distances maybe 3-4 ft) and there's not a thing wrong with it.

customer_reviews.title: Your gonna love it
customer_reviews.text: We have the original Rebel and many lenses and were super excited to finally upgrade our base. Very happy with the new T5i and back in love with taking pictures.

customer_reviews.title: So impressed with my camera
customer_reviews.text: This camera is awesome. I love the touch display and shooting pictures in low light at track meets and soccer games and still get great photos.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: Great camera... I'm finally able to capture good pictures of my kids in their various sporting events. I even have other parents asking me to snap some shots for them! Love it.

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy !
customer_reviews.text: For the value, a great camera. Takes unbelievable videos with a steady-cam and a large card... I am sure there are better cameras out there BUT NOT FOR THE PRICE. Save money on the Camera and invest in the lenses.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph S. Borrow

customer_reviews.title: Great camera. The lenses from my older Rebel fit ...
customer_reviews.text: Great camera. The lenses from my older Rebel fit and I love the new features. Going to south Florida to try it out next week. Will update after that.
customer_reviews.author: Woody Woodturner

customer_reviews.title: So far this camera seems to cool. I have a dozen or so features still ...
customer_reviews.text: So far this camera seems to cool. I have a dozen or so features still to learn but it is going well and I am really loving this camera
customer_reviews.author: Bob Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Great upgrade from my Rebel XS
customer_reviews.text: This camera is everything I expected and a great upgrade from my 5 year-old Rebel XS. It is set up in much the same way as my old camera and all the new features (touch screen, tilt screen, higher ISO ratings, etc.) work well and are easy to learn.
customer_reviews.author: Photobuff

customer_reviews.title: Cannon ESO T5i Digital Camera
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I expected, this camera is everything you will need to take beautiful pictures of every kind. Portraits, landscape, and action shots. Very simple to use, and excellent craftsmanship. Looking forward to many years of fun!
customer_reviews.author: KATHY B.

customer_reviews.title: No good on continuous shooting
customer_reviews.text: I have owned a Canon camera for years and this one does not compare to my other ones ! No good on continuous shooting.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Taylor

customer_reviews.title: nice!
customer_reviews.text: Still learning how to use all the different settings, but so far the pictures I've take have been great. Nice camera
customer_reviews.author: ,Heather

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great camera. Bought it to replace my old T2i. Now both are working well
customer_reviews.author: Wayne J. Ingram

customer_reviews.title: Love this camera
customer_reviews.text: We already have two canons but the increase in MP is very noticeable in picture quality. I love this camera.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Tanner

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful body only camera
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera as a gift for my daughter and she was thrilled. It replaced an older Canon that she has used for years. I know the description states that this camera is body only, but not knowing much about cameras, I did not understand that it did not have a lens at all. I thought all cameras came with a basic lens and that this one just didn't have any additional lenses. So if you are as unfamiliar with SLR cameras as I am, you will want to order a lens, if you do not already have one, so that you can take pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Gail L Cain

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: Truly amazing. If you enjoy taking great photographs, this is the camera for you. Very user friendly. Plus the possibility of using lenses you may have had before is perfect, the size of the body manages any size lense very well. ENJOY
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Hardman

customer_reviews.title: 5 Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have had all the Rebel series.. they are all great cameras.
customer_reviews.author: chmarkable

customer_reviews.title: Buy it if you want a great all around camera.
customer_reviews.text: This camera takes great pictures and is easy to use, you can shoot RAW and the cost is not bad for an armature shooter like myself. All in all I think this is a pretty good deal and the shipping was fast.
customer_reviews.author: gutterbanger

customer_reviews.title: packing of t5i
customer_reviews.text: i have never seen such nice and neat packing done was suprized when i opened it up impressed well done AAAAAA+++++++++++++++
customer_reviews.author: charles sadler

customer_reviews.title: LOVE Canon cameras
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE LOVE Canon cameras. Also have the T3i. Clear beautiful photos even under low light. Be sure to choose the right lens for your needs.
customer_reviews.author: Junior

customer_reviews.title: Its great
customer_reviews.text: it was a gift but they thought it is the best ever. very clear and perfect color pictures easy to use
customer_reviews.author: margaret howard

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good, but the sensor could be less noisier at times. Kinda limited with Magic Lantern.
customer_reviews.author: Doom

customer_reviews.title: Purchased as dedicated video machine
customer_reviews.text: I am a commercial still photographer just starting video. I purchased this camera just for video work. Simple, easy and terrific quality images from a small and light camera.
customer_reviews.author: Commercialphoto32

customer_reviews.title: T5i great and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I love new features particularly the lcd being fold out and protected screen big improvement. Easy to use and great pictures.
customer_reviews.author: John Weicherding

product_meta.title: Canon EOS Rebel T5i Digital SLR Camera (Body Only)
product_meta.description:
RENEW YOUR CREATIVE SOUL
Photo enthusiasts rejoice! The new flagship of the spectacular Rebel Line, the EOS Rebel T5i, is here to renew your artistic side with amazing imaging features and full-featured functionality. Users will be impressed at how simple and intuitive it is to create breathtaking photos with ease. The incredible image quality and performance starts with an 18.0 Megapixel CMOS (APS-C) sensor and Canon's superb DIGIC 5 Image Processor. Combined with an extensive ISO range of 100–12800 (expandable to 25600 in H mode), the EOS Rebel T5i boasts crisp, detailed images, even in low-light situations. A continuous shooting speed of up to 5.0 fps allows for fast action capture. 9 cross-type AF focus points help ensure crisp focus throughout the frame, and the Hybrid CMOS AF system enables speedy and accurate autofocus when shooting in Live View mode. In addition, the camera is compatible with Canon STM lenses for smooth, quiet AF performance. And the performance doesn't stop with photos. EOS Full HD Movie mode with Movie Servo AF makes shooting high quality movies easy, and the brilliant Vari-angle Touch Screen 3.0-inch Clear View LCD monitor II makes composing fun. Seven Creative Filters, now viewable in real time, puts composition control directly in your hands and is just one of the many features of the EOS Rebel T5i that is sure to renew your creative soul.

AMAZING CAPTURE AND PROCESSING POWER.
18.0 MEGAPIXEL CMOS (APS-C) SENSOR
The EOS Rebel T5i features Canon's amazing 18.0 Megapixel CMOS (Complementary Metal Oxide Semiconductor) sensor. Perfect for enlargements or for cropping detailed portions of the composition, the camera's sensor captures images with exceptional clarity and tonal range. This first-class sensor features many of the same technologies used by professional Canon cameras to maximize each pixel's light-gathering efficiency and has center pixels that aid in the EOS Rebel T5i's accurate AF performance. This APS-C size sensor creates an effective 1.6x field of view (compared to 35mm format).

14-BIT A/D CONVERSION
With 14-bit analog-to-digital conversion, the EOS Rebel T5i captures and records images with remarkable gradations and detail in subtle tones and colors, resulting in more realistic and detailed images. By recording up to 16,384 colors per channel, the EOS Rebel T5i ensures that the fine detail found in subjects like foliage, sky and water are preserved and recorded with a tremendous level of accuracy, ensuring gorgeous results.

ISO 100–12800 AND EXPANDABLE TO 25600 IN H MODE
Thanks to its DIGIC 5 Image Processor, the EOS Rebel T5i features an expanded ISO range of ISO 100–12800 (expandable to 25600 in H mode) that makes shooting possible in situations previously unthinkable without flash. The EOS Rebel T5i, with the DIGIC 5 Image Processor's remarkable noise-reduction technology, performs brilliantly in low-light shooting. Used with one of Canon's EF or EF-S lenses with Optical Image Stabilizer, the EOS Rebel T5i can record beautiful images even when light sources are scarce.

DIGIC 5 IMAGE PROCESSOR
The EOS Rebel T5i's DIGIC 5 Image Processor works with the camera's CMOS sensor to deliver images with incredible detail in more situations, without the need for artificial light sources. With the power of the DIGIC 5 Image Processor, the EOS Rebel T5i can achieve higher ISO sensitivity, can shoot up to 5.0 fps continuously and can even perform advanced functions like HDR Backlight Control, art filters, lens correction and much more. The camera's brilliant imaging core supercharges every facet of still and moving image capture.

THE SPEEDY REBEL!
HIGH-SPEED CONTINUOUS SHOOTING
The EOS Rebel T5i can shoot up to 5.0 frames per second, continuously. Thanks to the enhanced shutter mechanism, mirror drive and camera sensor, the EOS Rebel T5i is ready for action; whether capturing that perfect expression, the game's winning goal, or the bride walking down the aisle, the EOS Rebel T5i delivers the speed and performance to guarantee results.

ENHANCED AF SYSTEMS TAILORED FOR PERFECT STILLS AND VIDEO.
EXCEPTIONAL AUTOFOCUS PERFORMANCE AND HYBRID CMOS AF
The EOS Rebel T5i is equipped with AF features that ensure speedy, accurate and continuous AF every time. When shooting through the viewfinder, the EOS Rebel T5i has advanced autofocus with a 9-point, all cross-type AF system (including a high-precision dual-cross f/2.8 center point) for accurate focus whether the camera is oriented in portrait or landscape position. An AI Servo AF system achieves and maintains consistent focus with an exceptional degree of reliability.

The EOS Rebel T5i also features Canon's amazing Hybrid CMOS AF System, perfect for shooting photos and video in Live View. This system combines two distinct AF technologies, phase and contrast detection AF, for speedier and more accurate focus. These complementary focusing systems are aided by pixels on the camera's CMOS sensor that assist in predicting subject location, making continuous focus tracking quick and accurate in video recording while enhancing focusing speed.

TRUE HD PERFORMANCE, REBEL SIMPLICITY.
EOS FULL HD MOVIE MODE WITH MOVIE SERVO AF
The EOS Rebel T5i offers easy-to-use, professional video capture without compromise. Capable of shooting in a number of recording sizes and frame rates, the EOS Rebel T5i is the new standard for performance, quality and simplicity. The EOS Rebel T5i enables easy manual control of exposure, focus and Live View features, even in-camera editing! Movie Servo AF allows continuous autofocus tracking of moving subjects while recording video. When shooting video with one of Canon's STM lenses, such as the new EF-S 18–55mm f/3.5–5.6 IS STM, Movie Servo AF takes advantage of the lens' stepping motor for smooth and quiet continuous AF. With an STM lens attached, the EOS Rebel T5i is the standard for SLR moviemaking performance!

 

Resolution & Recording Sizes Frame Rates Full HD
1920 x 1080
16:9 format 30 fps (29.97) 25 fps – PAL standard 24 fps (23.976) HD
1280 x 720
16:9 format 60 fps (59.94) 50 fps – PAL standard Standard Definition (SD)
640 x 480 30 fps (29.97) 25 fps – PAL standard 

BUILT-IN STEREO MICROPHONE, MANUAL AUDIO LEVEL ADJUSTMENT
The EOS Rebel T5i has an internal stereo microphone for improved audio capture and a wind filter feature to reduce wind noise when shooting outdoors. Sound recording levels can be manually (up to 64 different levels) or automatically controlled. A built-in attenuator is also provided to reduce audio clipping. For more advanced audio recording, the EOS Rebel T5i is compatible with many third-party electret condenser microphones with a 3.5mm diameter plug.

VIDEO SNAPSHOT
With the Video Snapshot feature, the EOS Rebel T5i can capture short video clips (of 2, 4 or 8 seconds) then combine them automatically into one video file as a snapshot or highlights "album". With no editing needed after shooting, the compiled video is perfect for sharing online or displaying directly on an HDTV via the camera's HDMI port. Additionally, stills can be recorded during video shooting simply by pressing the camera's shutter button. During playback, video clips in an album can be reordered or deleted.

SHARP AND CLEAR, WITH TACTILE CONTROLS.
VARI-ANGLE TOUCH SCREEN 3.0-INCH CLEAR VIEW LCD MONITOR II WITH MULTI-TOUCH OPERATION AND TOUCH AF
The EOS Rebel T5i comes with a Vari-angle Touch Screen 3.0-inch Clear View LCD monitor II. Using capacitive technology similar to today's popular mobile devices, this screen is touch-sensitive and delivers intuitive touch panel operation. Two-finger touch gestures can be used for zooming or changing images. Menu and quick control settings can be accessed, and focus point and shutter release can be activated with the touch of a fingertip using Touch AF. Displaying fine detail (at approximately 1.04 million dots), this screen is perfect for composing and reviewing images. Thanks to a solid construction between the monitor's resin-coated cover and the liquid crystal display, reflections are minimized, and the display can be viewed, without glare, from any number of angles. The LCD's surface is treated with a smudge-resistant coating to minimize fingerprints and maintain a bright, clear image display.

COMPLEX FUNCTIONS MADE SIMPLE.
SCENE INTELLIGENT AUTO MODE
The EOS Rebel T5i features Scene Intelligent Auto mode, which incorporates a number of Canon technologies to deliver the best possible exposure. Joining Picture Style Auto, Automatic Lighting Optimizer, Automatic White Balance, Autofocus, and Automatic Exposure, Scene Intelligent Auto mode analyzes the image, accounting for faces, colors, brightness, moving objects, contrast, even whether the camera is handheld or on a tripod, and then chooses the exposure and enhancements that bring out the best in any scene or situation.

AMAZING EFFECTS FOR DRAMATIC AND GORGEOUS RESULTS.
HANDHELD NIGHT SCENE MODE
Accessible right on the EOS Rebel T5i's Mode Dial, Handheld Night Scene mode captures nightscapes with bright highlights and detailed dark areas, delivering results previously impossible without the use of a tripod. By shooting and combining four consecutive shots at a shutter speed fast enough to avoid camera shake, the EOS Rebel T5i's Handheld Night Scene mode makes dramatic nighttime photography simple.

HDR BACKLIGHT CONTROL MODE
The EOS Rebel T5i's HDR Backlight Control mode ensures that backlit subjects are not recorded too darkly. By shooting three consecutive shots at different exposures (underexposed, correctly exposed and overexposed) and then combining the images, the final result maintains detail in both the shadow and highlight areas, ensuring the backlit subject is properly exposed.

SEVEN CREATIVE FILTERS THAT CAN BE DISPLAYED IN REAL TIME
To add to the fun and creative possibilities available with the EOS Rebel T5i, the camera has seven different creative filters that can dramatically alter the mood and visual effect of any particular scene. Creative Filters include Grainy Black and White, Soft Focus, Fisheye Effect, Toy Camera Effect, Miniature Effect, Art Bold Effect and Water Painting Effect. Each effect can be applied in three different levels (low, standard and strong), and easily previewed on the LCD panel in Live View. Since the filters can be applied to the image after shooting, it's easy to try several effects on the same shot during post-process.

CLEANER IMAGES, EVEN AT HIGH ISO.
MULTI SHOT NOISE REDUCTION
To enhance its already admirable high ISO shooting capabilities, the EOS Rebel T5i features an intelligent Multi Shot Noise Reduction tool that reduces noise even further than the camera's sensor and the DIGIC 5 Image Processor do. With Multi Shot Noise Reduction activated, the camera takes four consecutive shots, merges and aligns them. This eliminates more noise than the Rebel's traditional Noise Reduction filter, with little or no apparent resolution loss. Moving subjects are even optimized to minimize subject blur! Thanks to this clever feature, high ISO shooting has never looked better.

FLEXIBLE AND RELIABLE RECORDING.
COMPATIBILITY WITH SD/SDHC/SDXC MEMORY CARDS, INCLUDING ULTRA HIGH SPEED CARDS


The EOS Rebel T5i uses popular SD, SDHC, SDXC, and is even compatible with Ultra High Speed (UHS-I), memory cards. Compact and available in large capacities, SD, SDHC and SDXC memory cards are a perfect complement to the camera's compact design.

Additionally, the EOS Rebel T5i is compatible with Eye-Fi* SD cards, which are outfitted with a Wi-Fi® transmitter (IEEE 802.11b/g) and an internal antenna for wireless, high-speed transfer of images. With an Eye-Fi card installed, the EOS Rebel T5i can display the Eye-Fi's connection status and error notes with ease, for fully functional wireless uploading of images directly from the camera.

* Canon cameras are not guaranteed to support Eye-Fi card functions, including wireless transfer. In case of an issue with the Eye-Fi card, please consult with the card manufacturer. The use of Eye-Fi cards may not be available outside the United States and Canada; please contact the card manufacturer for territory availability.

A COMPREHENSIVE SYSTEM OF OPTICS PERFECT FOR VIDEO AND STILLS.
COMPATIBLE WITH EF AND EF-S LENSES
The EOS Rebel T5i is compatible with all Canon lenses in the EF lineup, including compact and lightweight EF-S lenses, ranging from ultra-wide angle to super telephoto lenses and including the STM series optimized for video shooting. Canon lenses employ advanced optical expertise and micron-precision engineering to deliver outstanding performance and deliver beautiful results. Special technologies like Canon's Optical Image Stabilizer help to minimize the effect of camera shake, effectively adding up to four stops of light; STM lenses even feature a stepping motor for smooth and quiet continuous autofocus while capturing video. With an array of lenses perfect for travel, sports, still life and everything in between, photographers can truly maximize the quality and performance of their EOS Rebel T5i.

MORE FEATURES FOR INCREASED VERSATILITY.
LENS ABERRATION CORRECTION
The EOS Rebel T5i features lens correction tools that compensate for lens characteristics that can affect overall image quality. The EOS Rebel T5i's Peripheral Illumination Correction feature corrects light falloff in the corner of the image according to the characteristics of the lens being used. It even has correction data for a number of popular lenses stored in its memory. With the EOS Rebel T5i's chromatic aberration correction tool, distracting color fringing can be corrected at the time of shooting.

FEATURE GUIDE
To help explain the specific function of features found on the EOS Rebel T5i, the Feature Guide displays a simple description helpful in determining the applicability for the situation at hand. It is displayed in each shooting mode, during mode dial operations, and for Quick Control screen functions. It appears automatically when a function is selected – a lifesaver when trying to determine the best mode or function for the next picture. The feature guide works automatically by default, and can be disabled easily through the camera's menu.

GPS COMPATIBLE
With the optional GPS Receiver GP-E2 attached to the hot shoe or the digital terminal, the EOS Rebel T5i can record location, including latitude, longitude and altitude, and has the ability to track the trajectory of movement with its logging function. An electric compass records the camera's orientation during each shot, and world time information is recorded through GPS syncing.

JPEG RESIZING
To create images suitable for sharing by email or online, the EOS Rebel T5i can resize JPEG files, in-camera, of varying pixels (aspect ratio cannot be changed, only the image size can be decreased) while leaving the original image untouched.

PHOTOBOOK SET-UP
Photographers can share their images in book form with the EOS Rebel T5i's convenient Photobook Set-up feature. Users can easily choose specific images, images in a folder and even all images, then specify their sequence and layout. The results can be printed in book form with ease.

IMAGE RATING
To help organize images recorded to the camera's storage, the EOS Rebel T5i makes it simple to rate individual images from one star to five. Therefore, image browsing, printing and slide shows can be based upon those ratings.

SCENE MODE POSITION
Newly featured on the EOS Rebel T5i, the SCN setting on the Mode dial activates a choice of scenes on the menu screen for quick access to features like Night Portrait, HDR Backlight Control, Handheld Night Scene and more.
feature_bullets: 9 point AF system, all cross type
1080 (30, 25, 24 fps) and 720 (60, 50 fps) HD video (29min limit, H.264 format)
3" articulating touch panel LCD screen with 1,040,000 dots
Movie Servo AF for continuous focus tracking of moving subjects
Multi Shot Noise Reduction for better detail when shooting with high ISOs
GPS compatible with the GP-E2 (sold separately)
